# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a new paste configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init()
```

## Return Value

A paste configuration that has no acceptable uniform type identifiers (UTIs).

## Discussion

Use this initializer to create a paste configuration that has an empty [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteConfiguration/acceptableTypeIdentifiers] array. After you create the paste configuration, you can use its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteConfiguration/addAcceptableTypeIdentifiers(_:)] method or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteConfiguration/addTypeIdentifiers(forAccepting:)-4fvd6] method to add acceptable UTIs to the array.

## Initializing a paste configuration

- **init(acceptableTypeIdentifiers:)**: Initializes a new paste configuration with a specified array of acceptable UTIs.
- **init(forAccepting:)**: Initializes a new paste configuration with the UTIs declared as supported by a specified class.
- **init(forAccepting:)**
